post.title: Speaking of the Class Designer
post.content: As I pointed out in my last post, VS2005 includes a Class Designer that those familiar with the UML class model should feel right at home in. By happy coincidence, I found out today the Class Designer team is blogging. Additionally, two of the Class Designer team members – Ramesh and Rakesh - are blogging on their own. Apparently, the team blog will feature a new post every Thursday. This week’s post features an overview of the v1 Class Designer goals. Subscribed.
